###共同區域###

#Loading multiple .csv files as separate data frames
```{r}
getwd()
folder <- "data/"
file_list <- list.files(path = folder, pattern = "*.csv")
```

#read in each .csv file 
```{r}
for (i in 1:length(file_list)){
  assign(file_list[i],
         read.csv(paste(folder,file_list[i],sep=''),stringsAsFactors = F)
  )}
```
